title: Katharine McPhee shows off her taut stomach in a revealing black crop top
text:
She married music legend David Foster four months ago.

And Katharine McPhee seemed to be enjoying wedded bliss as she stepped out in a black crop top for a shopping trip in Beverly Hills on Saturday.

The Waitress star, 35, kept it casual in a pair of faded blue jeans as she headed into Paper Source with a friend during the outing.

Dressed to impress: Katharine McPhee, 35, seemed to be enjoying wedded bliss as she stepped out in a black crop top for a shopping trip in Beverly Hills on Saturday

She wore a white checked jacket with frayed edges and a belt that trailed along behind her, adding a pair of black heels with an ankle strap.

The singer shielded her eyes from the LA sun with a pair of sunglasses and pulled her hair back out of her face and into a high ponytail.

She accessorised her outfit by slinging a black drawstring bucket bag over one shoulder.

Casual: The Waitress star, 35, kept it casual in a pair of faded blue jeans as she headed into Paper Source with a friend

High spirits: Katharine wore a white checked jacket with frayed edges and a belt that trailed along behind her

Sensible: The singer shielded her eyes from the bright LA sun with a pair of sunglasses and pulled her hair back out of her face and into a high ponytail

Katharine and her husband David, 69, said 'I do' in front of nearly 100 guests at their London wedding in June, including David's two daughters, Sarah and Erin, who he shares with ex-wife Rebecca Dyer.

They married at St Yeghiche Armenian Church in South Kensington.

During the ceremony the singer wore a custom strapless ivory Zac Posen gown and afterwards she changed into her 'something blue' in a strapless blue silk tea-length dress.

She has changed her legal name after getting wed and took to Twitter after the ceremony, writing: 'Introducing Katharine Foster'.

The actress was previously married to Nick Cokas between 2008 and 2016. Interestingly, David played the piano at their wedding.

David has been married four times and has five daughters and seven grandchildren. His last marriage to Yolanda Hadid came to an end in 2017.

Newlywed: Katharine and her husband David, 69, said 'I do' in front of nearly 100 guests at their London wedding in June, including David's two daughters, Sarah and Erin, who he shares with ex-wife Rebecca Dyer

The big day came after she took to Instagram to pay a sweet tribute to now-husband David, as at the time they were just hours away from tying the knot.

In her pre-wedding post, Katharine shared a clip of her cover of the Wizard of Oz classic Somewhere Over The Rainbow, as she told fans it was released 13 years to the day before her wedding.

The caption read: 'Exactly 13 years ago today my very first single, Somewhere Over The Rainbow, was released right after Idol.

Old friends: Katharine was previously married to Nick Cokas between 2008 and 2016. Interestingly, David played the piano at their wedding

'Today... I’m marrying the man who produced it. Life is full of beautiful coincidences, isn’t it? Thank you for taking me over the rainbow, David. '

The two sparked dating rumours back in May 2017 while having dinner at Nobu in Malibu and haven't spoken much about their relationship to the public.

David proposed to Katharine back in July 2018 on top of a mountain in Anacapri, Italy.
